title: API Rate Limiting
description: Implement rate limiting for API requests.
acceptanceCriteria: Limit the number of requests per minute per user.

title: Dark Mode
description: Add a dark mode to the user interface.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can switch to a dark theme.

title: Email Verification
description: Add email verification on user registration.
acceptanceCriteria: Users receive a verification email after signup.

title: Push Notifications
description: Implement push notifications for new messages.
acceptanceCriteria: Users receive push notifications for new messages.

title: Data Backup
acceptanceCriteria: System performs regular data backups without downtime.

title: File Upload Restrictions
description: Set file size and type restrictions for uploads.
acceptanceCriteria: Only specific file types and sizes are allowed.

title: Audit Logs
description: Add audit logging for key actions.
acceptanceCriteria: System logs user actions for security and compliance.

title: Two-Factor Authentication
description: Implement two-factor authentication for added security.
acceptanceCriteria: Users must provide an additional verification code.

title: Session Timeout
description: Set automatic session timeout for inactivity.
acceptanceCriteria: Users are logged out after 15 minutes of inactivity.

title: Password Strength Check
acceptanceCriteria: Passwords must meet minimum length and complexity.
